name: Vitally
description: MCP server for integrating with Vitally customer success platform. Provides full CRUD access to accounts, organisations, users, conversations, notes, projects, tasks, admins, NPS responses, project templates, project categories, messages, and custom objects. Features client-side field filtering and permission management via ReadOnly/Destructive flags.
